decks.notes: This aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays, utilizing a mix of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, alongside efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt. The deck also includes Leyline cards to support its aggressive strategy and maintain board control. By quickly overwhelming opponents with its creatures and disrupting their game plan with removal spells, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly and efficiently dealing damage to the opponent with a combination of creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. The deck also includes cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Violent Urge to push through damage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By utilizing cheap spells and efficient creatures, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressively playing creatures and using leyline cards to amplify their power and protect them. It also includes cards that deal direct damage to the opponent's creatures or life total, allowing for a fast-paced and powerful approach to winning the game. The deck's mana base is built to support a wide variety of colored spells, giving flexibility in casting powerful creatures and spells. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, supported by powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. The deck also utilizes spells like Expressive Iteration and Preordain to maintain card advantage and set up explosive turns. The land base includes fetch lands like Wooded Foothills and Scalding Tarn to thin out the deck and ensure consistent mana sources. The overall strategy is to apply constant pressure and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts onto the battlefield, utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to generate mana and draw cards. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Cori-Steel Cutter provide additional value by recurring artifacts and providing additional threats. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for key pieces while Quantum Riddler disrupts opponents' game plans. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing efficient spells like Unholy Heat and Repeal to clear the way for its artifact creatures.

The key strategy of this Boros Aggro deck is to swarm the battlefield with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, while utilizing cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to deal direct damage to the opponent. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Thraben Charm and Seasoned Pyromancer, and disrupt the opponent's strategy with Blood Moon. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional versatility and synergy with the deck's creatures. The deck strikes a balance between speed and resilience, aiming to overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive threats.

The deck is focused on controlling the opponent's board by using disruptive creatures and removal spells, while also maintaining a strong aggressive presence with threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. It also includes powerful cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot while steadily building up its own board presence to overwhelm the opponent and secure a win.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards that can be cast without needing to have lands in play. By utilizing cards like Lotus Bloom and Force of Negation to generate mana and disrupt opponents, the deck aims to quickly assemble the Goblin Charbelcher combo to deal massive damage and win the game. The deck also includes control elements such as counterspells and removal spells to protect the combo pieces and disrupt opponents' strategies. Overall, the deck aims to win through a fast and explosive combo while maintaining control and disruption against opponents.

The deck aims to quickly generate and utilize mana through rituals and medallions in order to cast spells like Wish and Past in Flames to combo off. Ral, Monsoon Mage and Reckless Impulse provide card advantage and digging for combo pieces, while Wrenn's Resolve protects key spells. The inclusion of a few disruptive spells like Orim's Chant and Sundering Eruption helps to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck is focused on resolving its combo pieces efficiently while maintaining some control over the game state.

This aggro deck focuses on disrupting opponents' strategies while quickly building up a board presence with powerful creatures. It uses cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to apply pressure on the opponent, while also utilizing interaction spells like Prismatic Ending and Solitude to control the board. The deck also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Quantum Riddler for card advantage and consistency. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt opponents' game plans while quickly closing out games with its aggressive creatures.

The key concept of this deck is to disrupt opponent's strategy while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and utilizing powerful cards like Solitude and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. The deck also utilizes bounce effects like Teferi, Time Raveler and removal spells like Prismatic Ending to control the board. The deck aims to efficiently control the game and outvalue the opponent through a combination of disruption, aggression, and card advantage.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. Key cards include Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer for early pressure, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for board control, and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for a strong finish. The deck also utilizes disruption with cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to apply constant pressure and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. The deck has a strong mana base to support its aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays, utilizing a combination of cheap spells, efficient creatures, and card selection to apply early pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, the deck aims to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total while maintaining card advantage. The addition of Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration helps to dig deeper into the deck for key cards, allowing for consistent and fast aggression.

This deck revolves around quickly deploying artifacts onto the battlefield to take advantage of Affinity mechanics and generate explosive early-game pressure. By utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to ramp into threats like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Pinnacle Emissary, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The inclusion of cards like Tormod's Crypt and Engineered Explosives helps to disrupt opposing strategies while keeping the pressure on. By leveraging the power of artifacts, this deck can quickly snowball out of control and secure victories through tempo advantage.

This deck aims to control the game by ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Utopia Sprawl to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also includes cards like Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck utilizes a combination of ramp, control spells, and powerful threats to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer to pressure the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge for additional reach and removal. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ocelot Pride provide extra buffs and abilities to strengthen the board position. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing the synergy between cards like Guide of Souls and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to secure victory.
